basics.name: Your first and last name
basics.phone: A phone number, with any formatting you like. E.g. (555) 555-5555.
basics.summary: A one-sentence to one-paragraph overview text. Do not include any line-breaks.
highlights: Bullet-point list items that you would like to include along with (or instead of) a summary paragraph.

location.address: Your street address or mailing address
location.postalCode: Your postal code (ZIP in the U.S.)

profiles.network: A social media or other profile that you would like to include (e.g. LinkedIn, Twitter)
profiles.url: A URL to your user profile page

work.website: The URL for the employer's website
work.startDate: Your start date, in YYYY-MM-DD format
work.endDate: Your end date, in YYY-MM-DD format (leave blank for a current position)
work.summary: A one-sentence to one-paragraph summary of this employer or position
highlights: Bullet-point list items that you would like to include along with (or instead of) a summary paragraph.

additionalWork.company: Job history that you would like to group separately (e.g. old jobs, academic positions, etc)
additionalWork.position: All fields under the section are the same as for 'work'
highlights: Templates typically omit highlights for 'additionalWork' positions

education.area: Your area of study or degree earned
education.startDate: Your start date, in YYYY-MM-DD format
education.endDate: Your completion date, in YYYY-MM-DD format

skills.name: A category of job skills (e.g. 'Programming Languages')
